d:
This is just JorgtheWolph/MrNeoLeo. They just go by LightWaveDrake now. Came back to posting their work around late 2022. Just like last time I'm making a gallery archiving all their awesome work (just in case they decide to delate all their work again).

Here's all of their artworks I can find under their name. Both 2D and 3D work with some GIFs in between.

Here's LightWaveDrake (JorgtheWolph/MrNeoLeo)'s old artworks:
